com.wizzer.mle.parts.j2d

Class MleBufferedImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Image
      • java.awt.image.BufferedImage
        • com.wizzer.mle.parts.j2d.MleBufferedImage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.RenderedImage, java.awt.image.WritableRenderedImage, java.awt.Transparency

    public class MleBufferedImage
extends java.awt.image.BufferedImage
    This class provides a BufferedImage that maintains the origin of the image.
    Author:
    Mark S. Millard

    • Constructor Detail

      • MleBufferedImage

        public MleBufferedImage(int width,
                        int height,
                        int imageType)
        Constructs a BufferedImage of one of the predefined image types. The ColorSpace for the image is the default sRGB space.
        Parameters:
        width - The width of the created image.
        height - The height of the created image.
        imageType - The image type of the created image.
        See Also:
        BufferedImage

      • MleBufferedImage

        public MleBufferedImage(int width,
                        int height,
                        int imageType,
                        java.awt.image.IndexColorModel cm)
        Constructs a BufferedImage of one of the predefined image types: TYPE_BYTE_BINARY or TYPE_BYTE_INDEXED.

        If the image type is TYPE_BYTE_BINARY, the number of entries in the color model is used to determine whether the image should have 1, 2, or 4 bits per pixel. If the color model has 1 or 2 entries, the image will have 1 bit per pixel. If it has 3 or 4 entries, the image with have 2 bits per pixel. If it has between 5 and 16 entries, the image will have 4 bits per pixel. Otherwise, an IllegalArgumentException will be thrown.

        Parameters:
        width - The width of the created image.
        height - The height of the created image.
        imageType - The image type of the created image.
        cm - The IndexColorModel of the created image.
        See Also:
        BufferedImage

      • MleBufferedImage

        public MleBufferedImage(java.awt.image.ColorModel cm,
                        java.awt.image.WritableRaster raster,
                        boolean isRasterPremultiplied,
                        java.util.Hashtable properties)
        Constructs a new BufferedImage with a specified ColorModel and Raster.

        If the number and types of bands in the SampleModel of the Raster do not match the number and types required by the ColorModel to represent its color and alpha components, a RasterFormatException is thrown. This method can multiply or divide the color Raster data by alpha to match the alphaPremultiplied state in the ColorModel. Properties for this BufferedImage can be established by passing in a Hashtable of String/Object pairs.

        Parameters:
        cm - ColorModel for the new image.
        raster - Raster for the image data.
        isRasterPremultiplied - If true, the data in the raster has been premultiplied with alpha.
        properties - Hashtable of String/Object pairs.
        See Also:
        BufferedImage

      • waitForImage

        public static boolean waitForImage(java.awt.Image image)
        Wait for a specified image to load.
        Parameters:
        image - The Image to load.
        Returns:
        If the Image loads successfully, then true is returned. Otherwise, false will be returned.

      • blockingLoad

        public static java.awt.Image blockingLoad(java.lang.String path)
        Load an image from a file.

        This method will not return until the image data is fully loaded.

        Parameters:
        path - The name of the file to load.
        Returns:
        If the image is successfully loaded, then an Image will be returned. If the image is no successfully loaded, then null will be returned.

      • blockingLoad

        public static java.awt.Image blockingLoad(java.net.URL url)
        Load an image from a URL.

        This method will not return until the image data is fully loaded.

        Parameters:
        url - The name of the URL to load.
        Returns:
        If the image is successfully loaded, then an Image will be returned. If the image is no successfully loaded, then null will be returned.

      • makeBufferedImage

        public static MleBufferedImage makeBufferedImage(java.awt.Image image)
        Create a MleBufferedImage from the specified image.

        A default image type of TYPE_INT_ARGB will be used.

        Parameters:
        image - The Image to create a MleBufferedImage from.
        Returns:
        A MleBufferedImage is returned upon success. Otherwise, null will be returned.

      • makeBufferedImage

        public static MleBufferedImage makeBufferedImage(java.awt.Image image,
                                                 int imageType)
        Create a MleBufferedImage from the specified image using the specified image type.
        Parameters:
        image - The Image to create a MleBufferedImage from.
        imageType - The tyep of MleBufferedImage to create.
        Returns:
        A MleBufferedImage is returned upon success. Otherwise, null will be returned.
